page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area is generally flat with no significant rise in the land.The village of Brandesburton is the largest settlement in the area with a population of 1300 in 1981, including 350 patients of the local Psychiatric hospital. LANDUSE AND INDUSTRY Agriculture forms the major land use of the area although within Brandesburton itself some industry such as,marine engineering,boat building,gravel,computing,education and mobile building manufacturers are found. LEISURE The area has leisure facilities including a social club,cricket, football,squash,badminton. There is a branch of the Mothers Union. {
